channel.title: Cachedownloader not working?
channel.description:
Pastebin link: [url=http://pastebin.com/xjWjgigD]cachedownloader.java - Pastebin.com[/url]
Please PM me if you have teamviewer to help me solve this!
Okay, so I zipped all of the contents from the inside of my cache folder... I uploaded it to dropbox to my public folder, copied the public link, put it inside of the cachedownloader, compiled: no errors. But just to check if it's working I delete the cache from my C:/ and then empty my recycle bin. use the jar maker on my compiled client folder, open the .jar file I had just made, it downloads the cache from 1-100% but then after "requesting title screen" it goes to connection error. So I went and looked to see what had happened.. it just shows a rar folder with the name of my cache and a 20% in the middle of the title.. See if you guys can find anything wrong here.... I can't.

item.title: Cachedownloader not working?
item.dc:creator: @Free_Sosa Free Sosa
item.description:
@Free_Sosa wrote:

Pastebin link: cachedownloader.java - Pastebin.com

Please PM me if you have teamviewer to help me solve this!

Okay, so I zipped all of the contents from the inside of my cache folder… I uploaded it to dropbox to my public folder, copied the public link, put it inside of the cachedownloader, compiled: no errors. But just to check if it’s working I delete the cache from my C:/ and then empty my recycle bin. use the jar maker on my compiled client folder, open the .jar file I had just made, it downloads the cache from 1-100% but then after “requesting title screen” it goes to connection error. So I went and looked to see what had happened… it just shows a rar folder with the name of my cache and a 20% in the middle of the title… See if you guys can find anything wrong here… I can’t.

Read full topic
